frameOne.subHeading: Transform how your business speaks—create invoices, manage stock, track GST, and more—all through voice. Designed for India’s multilingual businesses.
frameOne.tagline: Trusted by 46,000+ SMBs across India — recommended by GST Network.

objectives.heading: Make Your Bussiness Vocal
objectives.subHeading: India speaks many languages—and Xenie understands them. Navigate invoicing, stock, customers, and reports by speaking your commands. No typing. Just speak.

objectives.heading: Simplified GST Compliance & Invoicing
objectives.subHeading: Generate GST-compliant invoices and e-way bills quickly, with accurate tax calculations. Stay compliant with continuously updated regulations.

objectives.heading: Manage Inventory with Ease
objectives.subHeading: Check available stock, ask for reorder levels, or track items at party- and product-level all via voice.

objectives.heading: Smart Business Assistant
objectives.subHeading:
Xenie is more than software. It’s your voice-enabled business partner that provides: Real-time insights on sales trends and inventory needs 
 Best-performing products or services  Identification of top customers and logistical cost optimization  Compliance with GST regulations—by simply asking

objectives.heading: Full Business Suite
objectives.subHeading: Voice or tap to access features like: Sales and purchase invoicing Cash and bank reconciliation Expense, order, and payment tracking Barcode scanning and customized invoice templates E-way bill and e-invoice generation Delivery challan support

scoll.heading: Mobile-First & Multi Platform 1
scoll.subHedading: Manage your business on the go using Android, iOS, or desktop. Voice features work seamlessly across all platforms.

scoll.heading: User-Friendly Interface
scoll.subHedading: Intuitive, clean design tailored for MSMEs ensures you can navigate quickly—no technical training needed.

scoll.heading: Automation & Insightful Reporting
scoll.subHedading: Minimize manual errors with automation. Get detailed reports to make smarter,faster decisions.

scoll.heading: Change-Proof
scoll.subHedading: Always upto date with latest GST reforms and statutory updates.
